name: charts-library
description: A modern chart library built with D3.js and React

scripts.build:vercel: lerna run build --scope=@charts-library/types --scope=@charts-library/core --scope=@charts-library/charts --scope=@charts-library/react && cd apps/playground && pnpm run build

scripts.publish: lerna run build && lerna publish from-package
